title: Cookie Policy
description: Information on the use of cookies on the Ivo Iuliano - Master Luthier website.
intro: This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them on this website, and how you can manage your preferences. We use cookies and similar technologies in line with applicable law and, where required, with your consent.

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies
whatAreCookies.body: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device (computer, tablet, or smartphone) when you visit a website. They are widely used to make sites work more efficiently, to remember your preferences, and to provide information to the site owner. Cookies can be "first-party" (set by us) or "third-party" (set by other services we use).

howWeUse.title: How we use cookies
howWeUse.body: We use cookies to: (1) Remember your cookie consent choice so we do not ask again on every visit. (2) Understand how the site is used (e.g. via analytics) to improve content and user experience, only if you have accepted non-essential cookies. (3) Support optional features such as theme preference where implemented.

types.title: Types of cookies we use
types.body: Strictly necessary cookies: these are essential for the site to function (e.g. consent banner). They do not require your consent. Functional and analytics cookies: we may use these to analyse traffic and improve the site (e.g. Google Analytics, Meta Pixel). These are only set if you click "Accept all" in the cookie banner. You can withdraw consent at any time via the cookie button or your browser settings.

thirdParty.title: Third-party cookies
thirdParty.body: If you accept analytics or marketing cookies, third-party services (such as Google Analytics or Meta) may set their own cookies. Their use is governed by the respective providers' privacy policies. We recommend checking those policies for details.

manage.title: Managing your preferences
manage.body: You can change your cookie preferences at any time by clicking the cookie icon (usually at the bottom of the page). You can also block or delete cookies via your browser settings. Note that blocking certain cookies may affect site functionality or your experience.

changes.title: Changes to this policy
changes.body: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or in the law. The "Last updated" date at the top will be revised. We encourage you to review this page periodically.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: For any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at info@ivoiuliano.it. For more information about your personal data, see our Privacy Policy.
